translated: Having given birth to ten children,
in this heap of bones and skin,
about the aggregates, sense-spheres, and elements.

analyzed: tassā dhammam suṇitvāna  kese chetvāna pabbaji
translated: Having heard that Dhamma,🔽I cut off my hair and went forth.
The five aggregates are fully understood,
standing with their roots cut off.
Enough of this body, born of the father and mother,
there is no more renewed existence.”
